is_publish.description: bisa buat update status quiz juga

questions.description: max 20 pertanyaan & 10 jawaban per soal. Kalau mau update questions butuh kirim ulang semua questions. kalau misal question_image nda berubah, field question_image_array_index diisi string filepath yang sudah ada

get.description: Lewat endpoint ini, field is_correct nda akan ditampilkan, question & answer juga akan dirandom kalau disetting random. Return error 404 kalau is_published === false
untuk preview game sebelum dipublish (kalau ada)

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: bedanya sama public, ini cuma bisa diakses owner / super admin. return 404 kalau not published

rounds.example: [  {    "type": "jeopardy",    "name": "Round 1",    "categories": [      {        "title": "General Knowledge",        "clues": [          {            "question": "What is the capital of Indonesia?",            "answer": "Jakarta",            "value": 200,            "is_daily_double": false          },          {            "question": "Which planet is known as the Red Planet?",            "answer": "Mars",            "value": 400,            "is_daily_double": true          }        ]      },      {        "title": "Tech",        "clues": [          {            "question": "What does CPU stand for?",            "answer": "Central Processing Unit",            "value": 200,            "is_daily_double": false          }        ]      }    ]  }]

clues.question: What is the capital of Indonesia?
Which planet is known as the Red Planet?

name.description: The new name of the game (max 128 chars).

is_publish.description: Set to "true" to publish or "false" to unpublish.

thumbnail_image.description: Upload a new cover image (replaces the old one).

settings.description: A JSON String containing the game rules (see below).

rounds.description: A JSON String containing the updated game board (see below).
